p: The five plant extracts ( Table 1), along with essential oils (EOs), pure phytochemicals, and antibiotics, were tested against four Campylobacter strains. The concentrations used ranged from 25–6400 µg/mL for plant extracts, 6.25–1600 µg/mL for EOs and phytochemicals, and 0.06–512 µg/mL for antibiotics.
